# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper Mine at position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0)
- Stone furnace (position x=41.0 y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5)
- Burner inserter (position x=41.5 y=-78.5)

### Copper Mine at position (60.0, -60.0)
Consists of the following entity:
- Stone furnace (position x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity Generation at position (106.5, -32.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5)
- Pipe group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5)
- Electricity group (position x=114.5 y=-28.666666666666668)

### Transport System at position (40.5, -83.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5)
- Transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors due to lack of fuel
- Ensure that burner mining drills, stone furnaces, and boilers have a sufficient fuel supply.
- Regularly check the status of these entities to prevent them from running out of fuel.

### Errors due to missing ingredients
- Ensure that stone furnaces have the necessary ingredients to operate.
- Regularly check the status of these entities to prevent them from running out of ingredients.

### Errors due to disconnection from the electric network
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to the electric network.
- Regularly check the status of these entities to prevent them from becoming disconnected.

### Errors due to empty or full pipe groups
- Ensure that pipe groups are not empty or full.
- Regularly check the status of these entities to prevent them from becoming empty or full.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
